name: Triangle Games
description:
Click one of your pieces to select it, or an intersection to move a piece there. (Invalid moves will be rejected.)

Capture
Yellow and purple alternate turns moving one piece at a time onto an adjacent vacant intersection. Yellow wins by starting a turn adjacent to purple.

Between
Red and green alternate turns moving one piece at a time onto an adjacent vacant intersection. The game is over when the green piece is directly between the two red pieces. The winner is the player that moved last.

Territory
Black and white alternate turns dropping one piece at a time onto any vacant intersection, claiming and shading territory when triangles are formed. The game is over when no vacant intersections remain. The winner is the player that claimed the most territory.

Made for Trijam #162, "It's All Connected."

The sound effect used for placement and movement of pieces was released into the public domain on freesound.org by zachrau.
